mapper.insert: INSERT INTO faq VALUES (null, #{adminid}, #{faqarea}, #{faqcorp}, #{faqname}, #{faqcall}, #{faqemail}, #{faqtext}, sysdate(), #{faqterm}, #{faqisnew}, #{faqisans}, #{faqanstext}, sysdate())
mapper.update: UPDATE faq SET adminid= #{adminid}, faqarea=#{faqarea},faqcorp=#{faqcorp}, faqname=#{faqname}, faqcall=#{faqcall}, faqemail=#{faqemail}, faqtext=#{faqtext}, faqterm=#{faqterm}, faqisnew=#{faqisnew}, faqisans=#{faqisans}, faqanstext=#{faqanstext} WHERE faqseq=#{faqseq}
